train_rocket_league.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 """Training script for the Rocket League project.
3 License:
4  BSD 3-Clause License
5  Copyright (c) 2023, Autonomous Robotics Club of Purdue (Purdue ARC)
6  All rights reserved.
7 """
8 
9 from rktl_autonomy import RocketLeagueInterface
10 from stable_baselines3 import PPO
11 from stable_baselines3.common.vec_env import SubprocVecEnv
12 from stable_baselines3.common.env_util import make_vec_env
13 from stable_baselines3.common.logger import configure
14 from stable_baselines3.common.callbacks import CheckpointCallback
15 from os.path import expanduser
16 import uuid
17 
18 
19 def train(n_envs=24, n_saves=100, n_steps=240000000, env_number=0):
20  run_id = str(uuid.uuid4()) # ALL running environments must share this
21  print(f"RUN ID: {run_id}")
22  # to pass launch args, add to env_kwargs: 'launch_args': ['render:=false', 'plot_log:=true']
23  env = make_vec_env(RocketLeagueInterface, env_kwargs={'run_id': run_id}, wrapper_kwargs = {'env_number': env_number, 'run_id': run_id},
24  n_envs=n_envs, vec_env_cls=SubprocVecEnv)
25 
26  model = PPO("MlpPolicy", env)
27 
28  # load weights from zip file
29  try:
30  previous_weights = expanduser(f'~/catkin_ws/data/rocket_league/model')
31  model.set_parameters(previous_weights)
32  except:
33  print('Failed to load from previous weights')
34 
35  # log training progress as CSV
36  log_dir = expanduser(f'~/catkin_ws/data/rocket_league/{run_id}')
37  logger = configure(log_dir, ["stdout", "csv", "log"])
38  model.set_logger(logger)
39 
40  # log model weights
41  freq = n_steps / (n_saves * n_envs)
42  callback = CheckpointCallback(save_freq=freq, save_path=log_dir)
43 
44  # run training
45  steps = n_steps
46  print(f"training on {steps} steps")
47  model.learn(total_timesteps=steps, callback=callback)
48 
49  # save final weights
50  print("done training")
51  model.save(log_dir + "/final_weights")
52  env.close() # this must be done to clean up other processes
53 
54 
55 if __name__ == '__main__':
56  train()
